DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study study interaction reduce clinical effect chlorhexidine fluoride combine mouthrinse .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigation assess clinical effect mouthrinse contain chlorhexidine ( CHX ) sodium fluoride ( NaF ) 4-day period non-brushing 6-week period brush . Two study design double-blind , randomize , cross-over clinical trial . In study I , 16 healthy subject rinse twice daily 1 min 4 day tooth brush four mouthrinse solution : 1 ) 0.12 % CHX + 0.2 % NaF , 2 ) 0.2 % NaF , 3 ) 0.12 % CHX , 4 ) placebo . In study 2 , 16 healthy subject rinse four solution twice daily tooth brush 6-week period . Primary outcome plaque formation gingivitis . Secondary outcome fluoride retention microbiological parameter plaque saliva ( total bacterial count mutans streptococci , lactobacilli streptococci sanguinis count ) . One way analyse variance post hoc Student-Newman-KeulÂ´s statistical test perform comparison mouthrinses . Intragroup change time analyze paired t-test .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , age 1835 year Good general health No sign periodontitis caries A minimum 24 teeth extensive restoration No current plan dental treatment trial period . Antibiotic treatment within 1 month prior start trial Current medication antiinflammatory drug Use antiseptic mouthrinses Smokers snuff user Use chewing gum
